insert into rater_vote_log_t (id,rater_id,
vote_college_id,
vote_candidate_result,
vote_field) values (#{id},#{raterId},
#{currentCollegeId},
#{voteCandidateResult},

mapper.select: select `current`.*,`campus`.campus_name,`campus`.id as current_campus_id, `college`.campus_id,`college`.college_name,`college`.candidate_num from current_vote_t as `current` join college_t as college join campus_t as campus on `college`.campus_id = campus.id and `current`.current_college_id = college.id;
select college_t.id,college_t.college_name,college_t.candidate_num,campus_t.campus_name from college_t join campus_t on college_t.campus_id = campus_t.id;

SELECT candidate_id,candidate_name,college_name,SUM(num) AS SUM FROM (SELECT candidate_id,number * 3 AS num,role,candidate_name,college_name FROM (SELECT vote.vote_candidate_result AS candidate_id,COUNT(vote.rater_id) AS number,user_t.role,candidate_t.candidate_name,college_t.college_name FROM rater_vote_log_t AS vote JOIN user_t JOIN candidate_t JOIN college_t ON vote.rater_id = user_t.id AND vote_candidate_result = candidate_t.id AND candidate_t.college_id = college_t.id GROUP BY vote_candidate_result,role ORDER BY vote_candidate_result ) AS a WHERE role='teacher' UNION SELECT candidate_id,number,role,candidate_name,college_name FROM (SELECT vote.vote_candidate_result AS candidate_id,COUNT(vote.rater_id) AS number,user_t.role,candidate_t.candidate_name,college_t.college_name FROM rater_vote_log_t AS vote JOIN user_t JOIN candidate_t JOIN college_t ON vote.rater_id = user_t.id AND vote_candidate_result = candidate_t.id AND candidate_t.college_id = college_t.id GROUP BY vote_candidate_result,role ORDER BY vote_candidate_result ) AS a WHERE role='student') AS b GROUP BY candidate_id,candidate_name,college_name
select id from second_vote_log_t where rater_id=#{raterId}
select * from second_student_t order by voted_num desc ;
